subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Mike Krzyzewski has become associated with Duke’s rise as a basketball power, but it was his predecessor, Foster, who re-energized the program after it had languished in mediocrity.
snippet: Mike Krzyzewski has become associated with Duke’s rise as a basketball power, but it was his predecessor, Foster, who re-energized the program after it had languished in mediocrity.
